sorcer.util
Class GenericUtil

java.lang.Object
  sorcer.util.GenericUtil
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GenericUtil
extends Object
implements Serializable

SORCER generic utility class. It implements the interface Serializable.

See Also:
Serializable, Serialized Form

getFileContents

public static Vector<String> getFileContents(File file)
                                      throws FileNotFoundException
This method was originally implemented by S. A. Burton, but has been rewritten by E. D. Thompson in a a cleaner more efficient syntax. The function gets the path to a file with the path file as an argument and returns the file's contents in a vector of strings where each element of the vector corresponds to a line in the file.

Parameters:
file - Path to the file
Returns:
Vector containing the file at the path file contents
Throws:
FileNotFoundException

setFileContents

public static void setFileContents(File file,
                                   Vector<?> fileContents)
                            throws IOException
setFileContents writes the contents of a vector of a string to a file. The function receives as arguments an output file path and a vector. This function is written by S. A. Burton and modified by E. D. Thompson

Throws:
IOException
Since:
JDK 1.6
See Also:

StringVectorFindAndReplace

public static Vector<String> StringVectorFindAndReplace(Vector<String> stringVector,
                                                        String find,
                                                        String replace)
StringVectorFindAndReplace is a function that takes as argument a vector of strings stringVector and two strings find and replace. It returns a modified version of the argument string vector stringVector where the string replace substitutes the string find in the vector of strings.

Parameters:
stringVector - - Vector of strings
find - - Sub-string to be replaced in the vector of strings
replace - - Sub-string that is substituted in to the vector of string where the find sub-string location
Returns:
Vector of strings containing a modified stringVector with the sub-string replace everywhere there was sub-string find
Since:
JDK 1.6
